result.execSummary:
The defendant Kimberlee A Martinez was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC [Modifiers: Possession of a Controlled Substance on or near Certain Places, Conspiracy to Commit], an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.
Court grants defendant 60 days to complete the community service.  Proof of compliance is to be filed with the Clerk of Courts office within that timeframe.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

chargeModifiers.descr: Possession of a Controlled Substance on or near Certain Places

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kimberlee A Martinez

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: from Martin Hansen of City of Markesan - defendant has completed 100 hours of community service
to the defendant in regards to the completion of the community service

2:28 p.m. Defendant present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading.  Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count.  Court finds probable cause.  Court instructs the defendant of his right to an attorney.  Court recites agreement.  Defendant concurs.  DA concurs.  Court goes over right to counsel.  Defendant waives right to counsel.  Court accepts waiver.  

Court goes over constitutional rights with the defendant - defendant waives these rights.  Court goes over the elements of each offense.  Court instructs defendant of the maximum penalty.  Court instructs defendant regarding deportation.

Defendant enters a plea of NO CONTEST.  Court finds the plea is made freely, voluntarily, intelligently and understandingly.  Court finds there is a factual basis to support the plea.  Court finds the defendant guilty to count 1 as charged.  Court orders the judgment of conviction be entered here today.  Sentencing statement by DA.  No statement by the defendant.

Court sentences the defendant to:  $100.00 fine plus court costs.  Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.

100 hours of community service - Court orders defendant to make contact with Office Pfluim in regards to the community service.  Court grants the defendant 60 days to complete.

Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.

Court adjourned at 2:36 p.m.
